Mailing Address: c/o Joyce Brinkerhoff943 Purcell CrtKelowna, BC     V1V 1N7
Service Details: - Celebrates the role of Kelowna’s citizens in international humanitarian efforts through a series of activities organized by a group of volunteers including individuals from local businesses, non-profit groups, civic organizations, public and private schools, and college/university students, features age-focused activities to entertain, educate, and inspire change- Brings awareness to the 17 United Nations' Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) by highlighting specific goals and what local people/groups are going to reach these goals
